page.title: 12HAMILTON-NEW TOWN ?
page.content: {Hamilton}is the name of a deserted medieval village to the N.E. of Leicester.It is also the name of a proposed development(including housing ,recreation and industry) between Leicester,Syston,Thurmaston,Barkby and Scraptoft.In 1976 Leicestershire County Council published the first plan for the area (Hamilton District Plan) but this caused great upset amongst the local population. Objectors,including individuals and groups such as the Halt Hamilton Action Group contributed to the shelving of the original plan about 3 years ago.In 1983 the plan re-emerged with minor alterations under a different title,the Hamilton Local Plan.Again local objectors have to compete with the plans of the local authority.Will{Hamilton}ever see the light of day ?
